summary: With his new lack of powers I could see Fjord suddenly getting really into training Nugget as a way to distract himself and the...
question: With his new lack of powers I could see Fjord suddenly getting really into training Nugget as a way to distract himself and the others.
answer: Oh my god, Beastmaster Ranger Fjord. The worst ranger branch, but still, that would be cool and would also annoy the hell out of Sam. Another ranger who won’t have their fucking pet attack because then Laura would be sad if it died.

tags: ''jester loves...PASTRIES! jester loves....FJORD!!!!! jester loves.......R E V O L U T I O N"
(tho that could just be canon jester tbh)
summary:
celestialily
 replied to your post  “winds-and-whispers
 replied to your post  “Headcanon that when Jester...”
                 ...
body:
celestialily replied to your post “winds-and-whispers replied to your post “Headcanon that when Jester…”
AWWW YISS that au sounds dope! would Marion be the overprotective parent trying to keep Jester from exploring the human world too much (and Babanon would be the mysterious sea god)? Or would Marion be the majestic sea goddess/singer who takes mortal lovers and wants the best for her daughter (and Babenon is the water genasi who renounced the land, and is now the antagonistic father planning something dangerous

I like both ideas but the latter version is my FAVE, I love the idea of Marion as Granmamare (that’s her name right?) just, aesthetically and in concept, so let’s go with that one :D also….YES Babanon/the Gentleman as Fujimoto is weirdly appealing too :D

celestialilyreplied to your post  “winds-and-whispers replied to your post  “Headcanon that when Jester…”

                       *something dangerous that Jester and her newfound land-faring friends have to prevent)? would Fjord be a version of Sosuke (not even for shipping, just so Vandren could be his absent sailor father figure), or would all of the mighty nein kinda fit into this role?          


Ahhhh yes again both of these make so much sense but I really enjoy the idea of it being Fjord, because as you said, the father figure thing!! Also though, the rest of the Mighty Nein need to be in there somewhere too? They could be other human characters but bigger roles that in the movie itself. (Also….I feel like the Traveler should be in this somehow, but HOW? we just don’t know)

summary: Prediction: If Fjord goes for the third and final temple of Uk’otoa, he will find Vandren guarding it. The last we know of the...
body: Prediction: If Fjord goes for the third and final temple of Uk’otoa, he will find Vandren guarding it. The last we know of the captain, he’s alive and “making amends”. Either he’s making amends for being a pirate, or for his role in bringing Uk’otoa to the world. I would love for them to have showdown or some kind of surprise Vandren out of nowhere

reblog.comment: Prediction: If Fjord goes for the third and final temple of Uk’otoa, he will find Vandren guarding it. The last we know of the captain, he’s alive and “making amends”. Either he’s making amends for being a pirate, or for his role in bringing Uk’otoa to the world. I would love for them to have showdown or some kind of surprise Vandren out of nowhere

tags: not trying to be shippy here really
like I said its probably character design that matched accidently
summary: today on random rambling I was looking at the official mighty nein art and I just realised that fjord and jester both have red...
body:
today on random rambling I was looking at the official mighty nein art and I just realised that fjord and jester both have red ropes on their clothing and by just realised I mean I knew they both had it but my brain just realised that they both have it yknow

and its probably just character design that happened to align considering jesters belt also has purple lines but I wonder if the two things are connected somehow because the two obviously spent time together before -enoug that jester knows that hes faking his accent

summary: A huge part of Fjord’s personality comes from him looking up to and watching Vandren. He doesn’t wanna talk about his feelings...
body: A huge part of Fjord’s personality comes from him looking up to and watching Vandren. He doesn’t wanna talk about his feelings or outwardly show them because he thinks people look up to stoic leaders who don’t “blush” in the face of danger. If he finally lets go of Vandren, of this part of his personality, what would the real Fjord be?

reblog.comment: A huge part of Fjord’s personality comes from him looking up to and watching Vandren. He doesn’t wanna talk about his feelings or outwardly show them because he thinks people look up to stoic leaders who don’t “blush” in the face of danger. If he finally lets go of Vandren, of this part of his personality, what would the real Fjord be?

He doesn’t wanna talk about his feelings or outwardly show them because he thinks people look up to stoic leaders who don’t “blush” in the face of danger. If he finally lets go of Vandren, of this part of his personality, what would the real Fjord be?
